title: Scope360° for Jira
description:
Scope360 solves Jira’s visibility issues for both classic projects and agile teams. It clarifies dependencies, tracks progress, aligns expectations, and detects bottlenecks. 

Gain full control over Jira Epics and optimize your workflow! 🚀

Check us out on Youtube youtube.com/watch?v=UYWnScpn2W8
